amendatorysection.para: For purposes of the Medicaid Access and Quality Act:
(1) Nonhospital provider means a provider of physical health services that does not hold a license as a hospital under the Health Care Facility Licensure Act;
(2) Physical health services means services billed under the medicaid practitioner fee schedule to meet the physical health needs of a patient; and
(3) Rural means any county in Nebraska having a population of less than one hundred thousand residents.

crossreference.para: Health Care Facility Licensure Act, see section 71-401.
